Suggest a feature

Tell us what you need!

We have many new features in development but we want to stick with what's really needed.

The real expert about guest management are those who actually need a guest management service.

So, we'd love to hear from you what can be improved and what new digital tools could help you organize and manage events in a productive way!


What happens after I send my suggestion?

We read every idea and then assess it's desirability to the majority of users and its technical feasibility. If it looks good we'll be in touch with you!
